entities.name: riddle house
entities.description: Riddle House is described as still being well kept and impressive. It is also mentioned that a maid entered the drawing room to find all three Riddles dead.

entities.name: little hangleton
entities.description: Little Hangleton is mentioned as the village where the Riddle family lived and where the police were summoned.

entities.name: the riddles
entities.description: The Riddles are described as being dead. They include Mr. and Mrs. Riddle and their grown-up son Tom.

entities.name: mr. riddle
entities.description: Mr. Riddle is mentioned as being elderly, rich, snobbish, and rude.

entities.name: mrs. riddle
entities.description: Mrs. Riddle is described as being elderly, rich, snobbish, and rude.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as being the grown-up son of Mr. and Mrs. Riddle and being worse than his parents.

entities.name: the police
entities.description: The police are summoned to investigate the deaths of the Riddles.

entities.name: the hanged man
entities.description: The Hanged Man is mentioned as the village pub where people gathered to discuss the Riddle family's death.
